channel.title: Gtlvote problem
channel.description:
[code]Loading Up Files... [GTLVote V1.1] Settings initializing... [GTLVote V1.1] Error connecting to the database. com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Communications link fai lure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,431,446,652,842 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond s ago. at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(NativeConstruct orAccessorImpl.java:57) at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingC onstructorAccessorImpl.java:45) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor.java:526) at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.handleNewInstance(Util.java:406) at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createCommunicationsException(SQLError.java:1 074) at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.createNewIO(ConnectionImpl.java:2214) at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.<init>(ConnectionImpl.java:773) at com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection.<init>(JDBC4Connection.java:46) at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(NativeConstruct orAccessorImpl.java:57) at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingC onstructorAccessorImpl.java:45) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor.java:526) at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.handleNewInstance(Util.java:406) at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.getInstance(ConnectionImpl.java:352) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :282) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:571) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:215) at org.Vote.Connect.connect(Connect.java:18) at org.Vote.MainLoader.<init>(MainLoader.java:22) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:75) Caused by: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Communicatio ns link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,431,446,652,842 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond s ago. at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(NativeConstruct orAccessorImpl.java:57) at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingC onstructorAccessorImpl.java:45) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor.java:526) at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.handleNewInstance(Util.java:406) at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createCommunicationsException(SQLError.java:1 074) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:341) at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.createNewIO(ConnectionImpl.java:2137) ... 14 more Caused by: java.net.UnknownHostException: pklegacy_server at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(InetAddress.java:901) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressesFromNameService(InetAddress.java:129 3) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(InetAddress.java:1246) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(InetAddress.java:1162) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(InetAddress.java:1098) at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFactory.ja va:243) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:290) ... 15 more [5/12/15 12:04 PM]: PkLegacy Server Configured [5/12/15 12:04 PM]: [Server] Finished Loading PietyPk Maps [5/12/15 12:04 PM]: [Server] PietyPk is Now Online! [5/12/15 12:05 PM]: Average Cycle Time: 0ms [5/12/15 12:05 PM]: Players online: 0, engine load: 0.0%[/code]

item.title: Gtlvote problem
item.dc:creator: @uncalled_for uncalled for
item.description:
@uncalled_for wrote:

Sure :). I’m glad you got this to work.

item.title: Gtlvote problem
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

uncalled for:

If you’re using a VPS you should know the IP lol… How else are you able to connect and use your VPS?

http://gyazo.com/c465f3e87a4017022f3159d2431ad70e

Thanks dude your a legend add me on skype: icy-tank

item.title: Gtlvote problem

item.title: Gtlvote problem
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“uncalled for, post:6, topic:551490”]Oh, remember to set your Remote SQL so it’s allowed to remotely access the database, so you need to set the IP’s allowed to do so.

To explain further, if you’re running your source on a VPS, on your Web Host cpannel click “Remote SQL”, press add host, and then add in your VPS IP

Or if you’re just using your own network, add in that IP.[/quote]

http://gyazo.com/6aefc7dcd2312926e79e04e3de90b3db

And it’s vps where abouts do i find the vps ip?

Read full topic

item.title: Gtlvote problem
item.dc:creator: @uncalled_for uncalled for
item.description:
@uncalled_for wrote:

Oh, remember to set your Remote SQL so it’s allowed to remotely access the database, so you need to set the IP’s allowed to do so.

To explain further, if you’re running your source on a VPS, on your Web Host cpannel click “Remote SQL”, press add host, and then add in your VPS IP

Or if you’re just using your own network, add in that IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Gtlvote problem
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

uncalled for:

Yes it would be correct :). My website ip is also a shared one. So the shared ip you’ve found will work.

[code]Loading Up Files…
[GTLVote V1.1] Settings initializing…
[GTLVote V1.1] Error connecting to the database.
java.sql.SQLException: Access denied for user ‘pklegacy_server’@‘108.61.241.121’
(using password: YES)
at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.java:1055)
at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.java:956)
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:3536)
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:3468)
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:917)
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.secureAuth411(MysqlIO.java:3974)
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.doHandshake(MysqlIO.java:1282)
at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.createNewIO(ConnectionImpl.java:2142)
at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.(ConnectionImpl.java:773)
at com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection.(JDBC4Connection.java:46)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)

    at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(NativeConstruct

orAccessorImpl.java:57)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(DelegatingC
onstructorAccessorImpl.java:45)
at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor.java:526)
at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.handleNewInstance(Util.java:406)
at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.getInstance(ConnectionImpl.java:352)
at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java
:282)
at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:571)
at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:215)
at org.Vote.Connect.connect(Connect.java:18)
at org.Vote.MainLoader.(MainLoader.java:22)
at server.Server.(Server.java:75)
[5/12/15 1:26 PM]: PkLegacy Server Configured
[5/12/15 1:26 PM]: [Server] Finished Loading PietyPk Maps

item.title: Gtlvote problem
item.dc:creator: @uncalled_for uncalled for
item.description:
@uncalled_for wrote:

Yes it would be correct :). My website ip is also a shared one. So the shared ip you’ve found will work.

Read full topic

item.title: Gtlvote problem
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“uncalled for, post:2, topic:551490”]Hey, this is a common error that I’ve had before, and is a EXTREMELY simple fix!

the fix is as follows:

When you use this line of code in your Server.java

for the “MYSQLHOST” DO NOT USE “localhost”, instead use your websites ip address. You can find this in your web host cpannel.[/quote]

i found a Shared IP Address would this be correct?

Read full topic

item.title: Gtlvote problem
item.dc:creator: @uncalled_for uncalled for
item.description:
@uncalled_for wrote:

Hey, this is a common error that I’ve had before, and is a EXTREMELY simple fix!

the fix is as follows:

When you use this line of code in your Server.java

for the “MYSQLHOST” DO NOT USE “localhost”, instead use your websites ip address. You can find this in your web host cpannel.

Read full topic
